::Perndabot::

Perndabot nods, his missile launcher leveled with Biomass's chest. If 
it came to a battle, the squid would have to be taken out first. 
However, Biomass's reaction to Perndabot's gun, plus the peaceful 
introduction, suggested that he wasn't here for battle.

"My name's Perndabot," Perndabot says, then gestures toward the Iron 
Fist, "That's the Iron Fist, the base of the Alliance. Why'd you swim 
up to shore?"




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> 
> * Biomass looked around with his huget eyes as the sun got so that 
it wasn't 
> so blinding, but that was the first time he'd been above water so it 
was 
> only expected.
> Nue'e blinked and tired to see what was on the island close to them 
because 
> her scanners were detecting a few of those beings they were sent to 
study.
> There was a really big male there and a female?
> With one of her little fins she tugged on a tenticle.*
> 
> " There's beings on the shore."
> 
> * Biomass looked towards the shore and studied the robotic people 
there, 
> swimming towards them a little until he stopps dead at Perndabots 
quick 
> mevement, drawing a weapon and aiming it towards him.
> Biomass sucks his tenticles in at the surprise of it all, having a 
rather 
> funny look on his face for a shocked squid.*
> 
> " Um...I am Biomass..." he gestured towards himself with a long 
tenticle, 
> then gesturing towards Nue'e.*
> " This is Nue'e, my biologist."
> 
> * Biomass moved towards land more, his tenticles long enough that by 
the 
> time he was moving in 12 ft of water his tenticles were streatched 
out and 
> probing the shore of the beach he was approaching, one getting 
really close 
> to Perndabot and a few more snaking around Swift's feet.
> Biomass made it to the beack and discovered that Perndabot didn't 
seem so 
> big now that he was up close.
> Nue'e swam as close to the shore as she could without beaching 
herself, 
> transforming into robot mode and walking the rest of the way. 
Stopping 
> beside Biomass and clasping her hands infront of her hips. Then 
moving to 
> shove her glasses up the bridge of her nose.*
>
